ComicInfo.Summary:
A Son of Anarchy by day but an impersonator by night, Bobby Munson is a man with many talents. After a gig in Las Vegas, Bobby wakes up to discover someone stole his cut. Armed with a couple more drinks and only the clothes on his back, Bobby will tear the Las Vegas strip a new one tracking down the men that robbed him.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 19:19:11. [CVDB476842]
